items.abstract: <jats:p>The processes of the development of the information society and the digital economy in the Russian Federation and the Krasnodar Territory are considered, primarily in sectors that are somehow connected with the agrarian-industrial complex and agriculture. The reserves of application of modern information technologies, cybernetic systems in organizations of the agro-food sector of the Russian economy, cybernetic approach to the management of resources of organizations in conditions of digitalization of agriculture are revealed. On the example of the dairy cattle breeding industry, perspective innovative developments based on information processing using computer technology are considered. Based on the analysis of trends in technology development in dairy cattle breeding, changes in information flows are shown that objectively contribute to the use of electronic herd management systems. A brief review of electronic devices that have been used in dairy cattle breeding is given, a scheme of the functioning of decision support systems for dairy herd management is presented. The components of the cumulative economic effect from the use of such electronic herd management systems, including the production of additional products and cost savings, are considered, the calculated structure of the cumulative economic effect is reduced by reducing the duration of the service period and reducing the incidence of animals with mastitis and ketosis. The conclusion is made about the expediency of using the electronic control system for dairy herds in the conditions of digitalization of the economy.</jats:p>
title: PERFORMANCE OF THE APPLICATION OF THE ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM OF THE DAIRY STAGE IN THE CONDITIONS OF DIGITALIZATION OF THE ECONOMY

items.abstract: <jats:p>Lift, leverage, and conviction are three of the best commonly known interest measures for crisp association rules. All of them are based on a comparison of observed support and the support that is expected if the antecedent and consequent part of the rule were stochastically independent. The aim of this paper is to provide a correct definition of lift, leverage, and conviction measures for fuzzy association rules and to study some of their interesting mathematical properties.</jats:p>
title: Interest Measures for Fuzzy Association Rules Based on Expectations of Independence

items.abstract: <jats:p>Generalized anxiety disorder - is a common disease, which is quite difficult diagnosed and treated. Cognitive-behavioral therapy is indicated to patients with GAD as a first-line method. This article provides an overview of the principles, advantages and evidence of the effectiveness of this type of therapy. Although cognitive behavioral therapy has advantage over other types of therapy for GAD, this issue requires further research, because there are problems such as a high percentage of patients interrupting therapy and relatively low percentage of clinically meaningful improvement.</jats:p>
title: Сognitive-behavioral therapy in generalized anxiety disorder
